responses: 1: Head of State (use this choice for single executive systems) (0=No, 1=Yes)
4: First (or unicameral) Chamber of the Legislature (0=No, 1=Yes)
6: Both Chambers of the Legislature are required (0=No, 1=Yes)
96: Other, please specify in the comments section (0=No, 1=Yes)
question: Who has standing to initiate challenge to the constitutionality of legislation?
